Bloak.comment: The site owner. I started making arrangements just after knowing Touhou, and without any musical knowledge, so don't take them seriously (lol). The works displayed here are my own favorites, but still not comparable to those from other great artists. To view my other works (as well as piano performances), visit my bilibili channel and check the video lists.

青汁.comment: Check out Magstic's article (in Chinese): https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv12062963

朋夜.comment: The website 【光と闇の協奏曲】 contains all the audio files. However, there is no direct url to individual files, so I won't link them in the performance section.

website.title: 海老福落雷電解研究所

海老福.comment: The artist stated that he recorded his performances as MIDI and did some manipulation on it, and the sheet music were made afterwards (see http://abfuku.asuscomm.com/pic/abmemo.txt). His scores are quite messy at first glance, but I believe you'll adapt to it after playing for a while. The pedal markings are bugged, just ignore them.

chiquchoo.comment: The old site contains analysis and performance guide for each piece.

Denko.comment: The old site contains analysis and performance guide for each piece.

ようか.comment: Check out Magstic's article (in Chinese): https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv5929648

A'.comment: Check out Magstic's article (in Chinese): https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv3321068

kituneyuu.comment: The artist's niconico account was deleted. Still, you can go to one of their videos and click 'next' or 'previous,' which will take you through the entire list.

Mitty.comment:
The artist has been inactive on twitter since 2020. A youtube comment in 2021 said he has already died (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qIz1PgpDKnw). 
The website,  http://mystic9th.com/ , has expired, and no sheet music was retrieved. The web archive saved his homepage (with little information) and two other sub-pages, one for his arrangements and another for his analysis of touhou OST and CDs. Check out https://web.archive.org/web/20170711192609/http://mystic9th.com:80/touhou.htm and https://web.archive.org/web/20170331204818/http://mystic9th.com:80/touhou_analyses.htm

SHI.comment: The artist's youtube channel still exists but all touhou related contents were deleted or hidden. Seaside (SHI's circle) website http://www.seaside-musix.net/ is also down (you can visit its webarchive page but there's no mp3). The only source I have is kkcwkoh's videos and Quellatalo's transcriptions.

柊秀雪.comment: Pianist and arranger. His early works were partially transcribed by Quellatalo but otherwise obscure. It seems that As/Hi Soundworks had an old site which displayed sheet music but it was taken down for unknown reasons. He has been publishing performance videos on youtube recently, sometimes with score snippets. You could ask for sheet music in the video comments and he might share it.

Midori Yakumo.comment: A mysterious transcriber who appears in the comment section of touhou music videos and casually drops a transcription.

website.title: 社会人でもゆっくりしたい
